abstract: France's first lady Carla Bruni-Sarkozy gives birth to a girl, first baby born to modern-day French president while in office.
snippet: France’s first lady, Carla Bruni-Sarkozy, gave birth to a girl on Wednesday evening.
lead_paragraph: France’s first lady, Carla Bruni-Sarkozy, gave birth to a girl on Wednesday evening.

headline.main: French First Lady Gives Birth to a Girl
headline.print_headline: French First Lady Gives Birth to a Girl
headline.seo: France’s First Lady, Carla Bruni-Sarkozy, Gives Birth
